welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Novato! This charming city in California is known for its breathtaking scenery and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and experience all that Novato has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Napa County Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Napa County Airport is reserved for private and charter flights, and offers a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buchanan Field Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Buchanan Field Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
